# Hellfire Storm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level**: [[Diabolic (Domain)|Diabolic 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 13]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time**; 1 standard action

**Components**: V, S

**Range**: Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft/level)

**Area**: 20-ft -radius spread

**Duration**: Instantaneous

**Saving Throw**: None

**Spell Resistance**: No

**Source:** Fiendish Codex II (WotC), pg. 101

This spell functions like *[[Hellfire (Spell)|hellfire]]*, except it deals 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d8) to creatures in the affected area,
